title: Bridging host–guest chemistry with molecule chemistry-covalent organic polyrotaxanes (COPRs): from synthesis to inactivation of bacterial pathogens
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30364-30377
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05381H, Review Article
Open Access

Juan Li, Jingsong Yuan, Guoli Sun, Wentao Li, Huihui Hao, Baolong Zhou
Covalent organic polyrotaxanes (COPRs), have emerged as thriving artificial intelligent materials, amalgamating the rigid molecular chemistry with flexible supramolecular host–guest chemistry, adopting a “couple hardness with softness” strategy.
